alert.note: Alert for Cottonwood; Jackson; Lincoln; Lyon; Murray; Nobles; Pipestone; Rock (Minnesota) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.senderName: NWS Sioux Falls (Southeastern SD, Southwestern MN, and Northwestern IA)
info.headline: Tornado Watch issued May 11 at 4:47PM CDT until May 11 at 9:00PM CDT by NWS Sioux Falls
info.description: TORNADO WATCH 202 REMAINS VALID UNTIL 9 PM CDT THIS EVENING FOR THE FOLLOWING AREAS IN IOWA THIS WATCH INCLUDES 11 COUNTIES IN NORTHWEST IOWA BUENA VISTA CHEROKEE CLAY DICKINSON LYON O`BRIEN OSCEOLA PLYMOUTH SIOUX IN WEST CENTRAL IOWA IDA WOODBURY IN MINNESOTA THIS WATCH INCLUDES 8 COUNTIES IN SOUTHWEST MINNESOTA COTTONWOOD JACKSON LINCOLN LYON MURRAY NOBLES PIPESTONE ROCK IN SOUTH DAKOTA THIS WATCH INCLUDES 7 COUNTIES IN EAST CENTRAL SOUTH DAKOTA BROOKINGS LAKE MOODY IN SOUTHEAST SOUTH DAKOTA LINCOLN MCCOOK MINNEHAHA TURNER THIS INCLUDES THE CITIES OF ARNOLDS PARK, BATTLE CREEK, BRIDGEWATER, BROOKINGS, CANISTOTA, CANTON, CENTERVILLE, CHANCELLOR, CHEROKEE, FLANDREAU, FULDA, GEORGE, HARRISBURG, HARTLEY, HAWARDEN, HENDRICKS, HOLSTEIN, HULL, HURLEY, IDA GROVE, INWOOD, IRENE, IVANHOE, JACKSON, LAKE BENTON, LAKEFIELD, LARCHWOOD, LE MARS, LENNOX, LUVERNE, MADISON, MARION, MARSHALL, MILFORD, MONTROSE, MOUNTAIN LAKE, ORANGE CITY, ORLAND, PARKER, PIPESTONE, ROCK RAPIDS, ROCK VALLEY, SALEM, SANBORN, SHELDON, SIBLEY, SIOUX CENTER, SIOUX CITY, SIOUX FALLS, SLAYTON, SPENCER, SPIRIT LAKE, STORM LAKE, TEA, TYLER, VIBORG, WINDOM, AND WORTHINGTON. THIS ALSO INCLUDES THE TRIBAL LANDS OF THE FLANDREAU SANTEE SIOUX TRIBAL NATION.

area.areaDesc: Cottonwood; Jackson; Lincoln; Lyon; Murray; Nobles; Pipestone; Rock
